headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DELMAN, RUTH ADLER

snippet: Delman--Ruth Adler, 96, of Boca Raton, FL, passed away March 23, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Jacob J. Delman. Devoted mother of Steven, Meryl, Richard and Paula. Loving grandmother and great-grandmother. Graveside service, Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, NY, Sunday, 1pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: Delman--Ruth Adler, 96, of Boca Raton, FL, passed away March 23, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Jacob J. Delman. Devoted mother of Steven, Meryl, Richard and Paula. Loving grandmother and great-grandmother. Graveside service, Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, NY, Sunday, 1pm. 1/3
